Pages.Name: phys_hinge
Pages.Description: A physically simulated hinge. Use the helper to define the axis of rotation.

Properties.Description: When travelling below this many units/sec, will not play any sound.
When travelling at this speed or above, will play sound at full volume.
Play this sound when travelling forward on helper axis
Play this sound when travelling backward on helper axis
When accelerating by more than this many units/sec^2 opposite to direction of travel, play the small reversal sound.
When accelerating by more than this many units/sec^2 opposite to direction of travel, play the medium reversal sound.
When accelerating by more than this many units/sec^2 opposite to direction of travel, play the large reversal sound.
Play this sound when making a hard reverse over the small threshold but less than medium
Play this sound when making a hard reverse over the medium threshold but less than large
Play this sound when making a hard reverse over the large threshold
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.

Options.Name: Change mass to keep stable attachment to world
Do not connect entities until turned on

Properties.Description: The amount of impulse an impact must apply to the constraint to break it. A way of calculating this is to set it to the mass of an object that would break this constraint if it were resting on the constrainted objects.

Properties.FriendlyName: Angular Impulse Limit to Break (kg * distance)
Properties.Description: The amount of angular impulse required to break the constraint. A way of calculating this is to multiply any reference mass by the resting distance (from the center of mass of the object) needed to break the constraint.
A sound played when the constraint is broken.
If one object teleports more than this many units away it will cause the other constrained object to teleport to an appropriate relative position.
Resistance/friction in the hinge. A value of 1 will hold the child object still under gravity
Minimum rotation limit around hinge axis
Maximum rotation limit around hinge axis
Initial rotation of the hinge (values -1 to 1 where -1 mean open at minimum limit and 1 means open at maximum limit)
Range 0 - 30 (only used when driving the relative angle through the angle input)
Range 0 - 1 (only used when driving the relative angle through the angle input)
Scale of the load connected to this hinge (1=just the objects directly connected)

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillConstrained
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity, all its children, and anything constrained to it, from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game. Parameter is the inflictor.

InputOutputs.Name: Break
InputOutputs.Description: Force the constraint to break.

InputOutputs.Name: TurnOn
InputOutputs.Description: Enable the constraint.  Do this when the objects don't exist when the constraint spawns - or when you have deactivated the constraint.  Broken constraints can NOT be turned on.  They have been deleted.

InputOutputs.Name: TurnOff
InputOutputs.Description: Disable this constraint.

InputOutputs.Name: OnBreak
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the constraint breaks.

InputOutputs.Name: SetAngularVelocity
InputOutputs.Description: Set angular velocity around the hinge (motor) in deg/sec

InputOutputs.Name: SetHingeFriction
InputOutputs.Description: Set Motor Friction, 0 = no friction, 1 = friction that is about enough to counter gravity

InputOutputs.Name: SetMinLimit
InputOutputs.Description: Set the minimum hinge angle (degrees)

InputOutputs.Name: SetMaxLimit
InputOutputs.Description: Set the maximum hinge angle (degrees)

InputOutputs.Name: SetMotorTargetVelocity
InputOutputs.Description: Set Motor target velocity in deg/sec, use 0 to just turn friction on

InputOutputs.Name: SetMotorTargetAngle
InputOutputs.Description: Set Motor target angle, degrees. Exact number depends on constrained bodies reference frames and initial configuration. See constraint limits for reference to sensible range of values.

InputOutputs.Name: NotifyMinLimitReached
InputOutputs.Description: The min limit has been reached.

InputOutputs.Name: NotifyMaxLimitReached
InputOutputs.Description: The max limit has been reached.

InputOutputs.Name: OnStartMoving
InputOutputs.Description: Fires if the attached objects start rotating around the hinge axis relatively to each other.

InputOutputs.Name: OnStopMoving
InputOutputs.Description: Fires if the attached objects stip rotating around the hinge axis relatively to each other.
